question: Which of the following initiative jointly launched by the Ministry of Power & Ministry of Textiles aims to provide the energy efficient Powerlooms, Motors, and Rapier Kits to small and medium powerloom units at no upfront cost?
explanation: Ministries of Power and Ministry of Textiles have together launched the SAATHI (Sustainable and Accelerated Adoption of efficient Textile technologies to Help small Industries). Under this initiative, Energy Efficiency Services Limited (EESL), a public sector entity would procure energy efficient Powerlooms, Motors, and Rapier Kits in bulk and provide them to small and medium Powerloom units at no upfront cost. The SAATHI initiative of the Government will be jointly implemented by EESL and the office of the Textile Commissioner on a pan-India basis.
